types:type.name: Emp
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Emp = {| empname: String, empsal: Number {"typeId": "int"}, emploc: String, sex: String, hire: String, empstatus: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empname\\\":\\\"Charan\\\",\\\"empsal\\\":200000,\\\"emploc\\\":\\\"Hyd\\\",\\\"sex\\\":\\\"M\\\",\\\"hire\\\":\\\"2021-04-19\\\",\\\"empstatus\\\":\\\"A\\\"}"}

types:type.name: Emp_PlukUsecase
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Emp_PlukUsecase = {| empid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empname: String, empaddress: {| HNO: String, HouseName: String, Street: String, City: String, PIN: String |}, empstatus: String, empJoinDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empid\\\":100,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"Charan\\\",\\\"empaddress\\\":{\\\"HNO\\\":\\\"9999\\\",\\\"HouseName\\\":\\\"ENCLAVE\\\",\\\"Street\\\":\\\"3rd line\\\",\\\"City\\\":\\\"hyd\\\",\\\"PIN\\\":\\\"38\\\"},\\\"empstatus\\\":\\\"A\\\",\\\"empJoinDate\\\":\\\"2021-04-19 10:09:28\\\"}"}

types:type.name: Pluk_target
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Pluk_target = {| empid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empname: String, empaddress: {| HNO: String, HouseName: String, Street: String, City: String, PIN: String |}, empstatus: String, empJoinDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empid\\\":100,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"Charan\\\",\\\"empaddress\\\":{\\\"HNO\\\":\\\"9999\\\",\\\"HouseName\\\":\\\"ENCLAVE\\\",\\\"Street\\\":\\\"3rd line\\\",\\\"City\\\":\\\"hyd\\\",\\\"PIN\\\":\\\"38\\\"},\\\"empstatus\\\":\\\"A\\\",\\\"empJoinDate\\\":\\\"2021-04-19 10:09:28\\\"}"}

types:type.name: Target_Meta
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Target_Meta = {| empid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, empname: String, empaddress: String, empstatus: String, empJoinDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"empid\\\":100,\\\"empname\\\":\\\"Charan\\\",\\\"empaddress\\\":\\\"bklkbldblkblkblvkblkblvkblvkblvkblkblkbvlbklvbkvlkbvl\\\",\\\"empstatus\\\":\\\"A\\\",\\\"empJoinDate\\\":\\\"2021-04-19 10:09:28\\\"}"}

types:type.name: employee
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type employee = {| empno: Number {"typeId": "int"}, ename: String, job: String, mgr: Number {"typeId": "int"}, hiredate: String, sal: Number {"typeId": "double"}, comm: Number {"typeId": "double"}, deptno: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"empno\\\":213,\\\"ename\\\":\\\"Charan\\\",\\\"job\\\":\\\"Clerk\\\",\\\"mgr\\\":7902,\\\"hiredate\\\":\\\"1980-12-17\\\",\\\"sal\\\":800.00,\\\"comm\\\":300.00,\\\"deptno\\\":20}"}

types:type.name: emp_target_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type emp_target_json = {| empno: Number {"typeId": "int"}, ename: String, job: String, mgr: Number {"typeId": "int"}, hiredate: String, sal: Number {"typeId": "double"}, comm: Number {"typeId": "double"}, deptno: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"empno\\\":213,\\\"ename\\\":\\\"Charan\\\",\\\"job\\\":\\\"Clerk\\\",\\\"mgr\\\":7902,\\\"hiredate\\\":\\\"1980-12-17\\\",\\\"sal\\\":800.00,\\\"comm\\\":300.00,\\\"deptno\\\":20}"}
